description:
An application to read and store quotes Qwotable is an application, that has a ever growing collection of quotes. Qwotable is using Google's latest Material 3 design language and is written in Kotlin - Jetpack Compose. Features:
  • Copy and Share quotes
  • Mark quotes as favorite
  • Random quotes (for certain APIs inside of the app and only on English and for a local database on an app widget)
  • Add your own quotes (all previously named features available + they are also shown on the app widget)
